page.title: 01Preston and Sutton Poyntz
page.content: Moving eastwards along the coast from Weymouth are to be found the residential areas of{Overcombe, {Preston, Littlemoor and Sutton Poyntz. Interspersed with the housing developments are farmland and tourist sites. Round Barrows, Hill Forts, Roman Ruins, reveal a continuous pattern of Human activity, which today is shown by the new estates being built at Littlemoor. The area accommodates many tourists in static caravans and approaching from the east you will be struck by the proliferation of caravan sites. Away from the coast there are quiet country lanes and footpaths to explore which reveal superb views at every turn.
